interface.name: C14NMethodParameterSpec
interface.javadoc:
A specification of algorithm parameters for a {@link CanonicalizationMethod}Algorithm. The purpose of this interface is to group (and provide type safety for) all canonicalization (C14N) parameter specifications. All canonicalization parameter specifications must implement this interface.
Sean Mullan
JSR 105 Expert Group
1.6
CanonicalizationMethod
